title: Why You Should Never Kiss Your Fake Boyfriend
description: A fake dating, opposites attract rom comWow, the kisses sure don’t feel fake…Morgan needs a date to some swanky something-or-other. Doug “Dooley” Miller is more of a fish-sticks-and-denim guy. But for a woman who’s not afraid to get naughty in an elevator at a charity fundraiser, he can stand a couple days of smoked salmon and Armani.With their chemistry there’s no doubt they can pull off a fake relationship. What could go wrong? It’s just a weekend. It’s just this one time. They just need to remember that in the end, they’re going in completely opposite directions.this book was previously published as Just For Fun (Just Everyday Heroes: Day Shift/ the Bradfords)The Series:Why You Should Never Kiss Your Boss (Ben & Jessica)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Blind Date (Sam & Dani)Why You Should Never Kiss A Grump (Mac & Sara)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Fake Boyfriend (Dooley & Morgan)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Ex-Husband (Kevin & Eve)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Brother’s Best Friend (Ryan & Amanda)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Ex (Shane & Isabelle)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Enemy (Nate & Emma)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Best Friend (Cody & Olivia)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Roommate (Conner & Gabby)
author: Erin Nicholas
